verses.text: Why \w standest|strong="H5975"\w* thou afar \w off|strong="H7350"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*? \add why\add* \w hidest|strong="H5956"\w* thou \add thyself\add* in \w times|strong="H6256"\w* of \w trouble|strong="H6869"\w*?

The \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* in \add his\add* \w pride|strong="H1346"\w* doth \w persecute|strong="H1814"\w* the \w poor|strong="H6041"\w*: let them be \w taken|strong="H8610"\w* in the \w devices|strong="H4209"\w* \w that|strong="H2098"\w* they have \w imagined|strong="H2803"\w*.\f + \fr 10.2 \ft The wicked…: Heb. In the pride of the wicked he doth persecute\f*

For the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w boasteth|strong="H1984"\w* of his \w heart’s|strong="H5315"\w* \w desire|strong="H8378"\w*, and \w blesseth|strong="H1288"\w* the \w covetous|strong="H1214"\w*, \add whom\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w abhorreth|strong="H5006"\w*.\f + \fr 10.3 \ft heart’s: Heb. soul’s\f*\f + \fr 10.3 \ft blesseth…: or, the covetous blesseth himself, he abhorreth the \+nd LORD\+nd*\f*

The \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*, through the \w pride|strong="H1363"\w* of his \w countenance|strong="H0639"\w*, will not \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* \add after God:\add* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add is\add* not in all his \w thoughts|strong="H4209"\w*.\f + \fr 10.4 \ft God is…: or, all his thoughts are, There is no God\f*

His \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* are \w always|strong="H6256"\w* \w grievous|strong="H2342"\w*; thy \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w* \add are\add* far \w above|strong="H4791"\w* out of his sight: \add as for\add* all his \w enemies|strong="H6887"\w*, he \w puffeth|strong="H6315"\w* at them.

He hath \w said|strong="H0559"\w* in his \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, I shall not be \w moved|strong="H4131"\w*: for \add I shall\add* \w never|strong="H1755"\w* \add be\add* in \w adversity|strong="H7451"\w*.\f + \fr 10.6 \ft never: Heb. unto generation and generation\f*

His \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* is \w full|strong="H4390"\w* of \w cursing|strong="H0423"\w* and \w deceit|strong="H4820"\w* and \w fraud|strong="H8496"\w*: under his \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* \add is\add* \w mischief|strong="H5999"\w* and \w vanity|strong="H0205"\w*.\f + \fr 10.7 \ft deceit: Heb. deceits\f*\f + \fr 10.7 \ft vanity: or, iniquity\f*

He \w sitteth|strong="H3427"\w* in the lurking \w places|strong="H3993"\w* of the \w villages|strong="H2691"\w*: in the secret \w places|strong="H4565"\w* doth he \w murder|strong="H2026"\w* the \w innocent|strong="H5355"\w*: his \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* are privily \w set|strong="H6845"\w* against the \w poor|strong="H2489"\w*.\f + \fr 10.8 \ft are…: Heb. hide themselves\f*

He lieth in \w wait|strong="H0693"\w* \w secretly|strong="H4565"\w* as a \w lion|strong="H0738"\w* in his \w den|strong="H5520"\w*: he lieth in \w wait|strong="H0693"\w* to \w catch|strong="H2414"\w* the \w poor|strong="H6041"\w*: he doth \w catch|strong="H2414"\w* the \w poor|strong="H6041"\w*, when he \w draweth|strong="H4900"\w* him into his \w net|strong="H7568"\w*.\f + \fr 10.9 \ft secretly: Heb. in the secret places\f*

He \w croucheth|strong="H1794"\w*, \add and\add* \w humbleth|strong="H7817"\w* himself, that the \w poor|strong="H2426"\w* may \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* by his strong \w ones|strong="H6099"\w*.\f + \fr 10.10 \ft He…: Heb. He breaketh himself\f*\f + \fr 10.10 \ft by…: or, into his strong parts\f*

He hath \w said|strong="H0559"\w* in his \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, \w God|strong="H0410"\w* hath \w forgotten|strong="H7911"\w*: he \w hideth|strong="H5641"\w* his \w face|strong="H6440"\w*; he will \w never|strong="H5331"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \add it\add*.

\w Arise|strong="H6965"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; O \w God|strong="H0410"\w*, lift \w up|strong="H5375"\w* thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*: \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* not the \w humble|strong="H6035"\w*.\f + \fr 10.12 \ft humble: or, afflicted\f*

Wherefore doth the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w contemn|strong="H5006"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*? he hath \w said|strong="H0559"\w* in his \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, Thou wilt not \w require|strong="H1875"\w* \add it\add*.

Thou hast \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \add it;\add* for thou \w beholdest|strong="H5027"\w* \w mischief|strong="H5999"\w* and \w spite|strong="H3708"\w*, to \w requite|strong="H5414"\w* \add it\add* with thy \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*: the \w poor|strong="H2489"\w* \w committeth|strong="H5800"\w* himself unto thee; thou art the \w helper|strong="H5826"\w* of the \w fatherless|strong="H3490"\w*.\f + \fr 10.14 \ft committeth: Heb. leaveth\f*

\w Break|strong="H7665"\w* thou the \w arm|strong="H2220"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* and the \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \add man:\add* seek \w out|strong="H1875"\w* his \w wickedness|strong="H7562"\w* \add till\add* thou \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w none|strong="H1077"\w*.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* and \w ever|strong="H5703"\w*: the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w* are \w perished|strong="H0006"\w* out of his \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

\nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, thou hast \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* the \w desire|strong="H8378"\w* of the \w humble|strong="H6035"\w*: thou wilt \w prepare|strong="H3559"\w* their \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, thou wilt cause thine \w ear|strong="H0241"\w* to \w hear|strong="H7181"\w*:\f + \fr 10.17 \ft prepare: or, establish\f*

To \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* the \w fatherless|strong="H3490"\w* and the \w oppressed|strong="H1790"\w*, that the \w man|strong="H0582"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* may no \w more|strong="H3254"\w* \w oppress|strong="H6206"\w*.\f + \fr 10.18 \ft oppress: or, terrify\f*
